Bayonne.Neville House (Staten Island): Neville House (also known as the Tysen-Neville House) is a historic home located at New Brighton, Staten Island, New York. It was built about 1770 and is constructed of red, quarried sandstone. It is in two sections: a ​2 1⁄2-story main section and ​1 1⁄2-story east wing, each covered by a gable roof.
